org.mitre.synthea.helpers

Interface RandomNumberGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Generator, Person

    public interface RandomNumberGenerator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double rand()
      Returns a double between 0-1 from a uniform distribution.
      default double rand(double[] range)
      Helper function to get a random number based on an array of [min, max].
      default double rand(double low, double high)
      Returns a random double in the given range.
      default double rand(double low, double high, java.lang.Integer decimals)
      Returns a random double in the given range with no more that the specified number of decimal places.
      default double rand(int[] range)
      Helper function to get a random number based on an integer array of [min, max].
      default java.lang.String rand(java.lang.String[] choices)
      Return one of the options randomly with uniform distribution.
      boolean randBoolean()
      Returns a random boolean.
      double randGaussian()
      Returns a double between from a normal distribution with mean of 0 and standard deviation of 1.
      int randInt()
      Returns a random integer.
      int randInt(int bound)
      Returns a random integer in the given bound.
      long randLong()
      Return a random long.
      java.util.UUID randUUID()
      Return a random UUID.

    • Method Detail

      • rand

        double rand()
        Returns a double between 0-1 from a uniform distribution.

      • rand

        default double rand(double low,
                    double high)
        Returns a random double in the given range.

      • rand

        default double rand(double low,
                    double high,
                    java.lang.Integer decimals)
        Returns a random double in the given range with no more that the specified number of decimal places.

      • rand

        default double rand(double[] range)
        Helper function to get a random number based on an array of [min, max]. This should be used primarily when pulling ranges from YML.
        Parameters:
        range - array [min, max]
        Returns:
        random double between min and max

      • rand

        default java.lang.String rand(java.lang.String[] choices)
        Return one of the options randomly with uniform distribution.
        Parameters:
        choices - The options to be returned.
        Returns:
        One of the options randomly selected.

      • rand

        default double rand(int[] range)
        Helper function to get a random number based on an integer array of [min, max]. This should be used primarily when pulling ranges from YML.
        Parameters:
        range - array [min, max]
        Returns:
        random double between min and max

      • randBoolean

        boolean randBoolean()
        Returns a random boolean.

      • randGaussian

        double randGaussian()
        Returns a double between from a normal distribution with mean of 0 and standard deviation of 1.

      • randInt

        int randInt()
        Returns a random integer.

      • randInt

        int randInt(int bound)
        Returns a random integer in the given bound.

      • randLong

        long randLong()
        Return a random long.

      • randUUID

        java.util.UUID randUUID()
        Return a random UUID.
